flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Bend the paper clips as shown. Use as many you need for this project.
lines.text_raw: Bend the paper clips as shown. Use as many you need for this project.

lines.text: Insert the paper clips around the cork so that it looks something like this.
lines.text_raw: Insert the paper clips around the cork so that it looks something like this.

lines.text: It takes a bit of care to push the paper clips so they won't bend. If that happens, it's OK; just straighten them out again.
lines.text_raw: It takes a bit of care to push the paper clips so they won't bend. If that happens, it's OK; just straighten them out again.

lines.text: If your cork stand falls over, bend a paper clip in an "L" shape to make a stabilizing foot.
lines.text_raw: If your cork stand falls over, bend a paper clip in an "L" shape to make a stabilizing foot.

lines.text: This shape is also helpful when building the arms that come out to hold the small dish that you will put on top of the stand.
lines.text_raw: This shape is also helpful when building the arms that come out to hold the small dish that you will put on top of the stand.

lines.text: Enjoy the holder you made using things in your house!
lines.text_raw: Enjoy the holder you made using things in your house!

lines.text: I put a Pepsi can on it to show you how well it works.
lines.text_raw: I put a Pepsi can on it to show you how well it works.

guide.summary: Make a holder for your soda can out of a cork and some paper clips.
guide.title: Cork Can Holder
